summary.para: Contains classes that support the infrastructure of the eXpress Persistent Objects.
Applied to XPO persistent classes, their fields or properties. Specifies that the target class, property or field should be hidden when generating OData v3 Service metadata.
Applied to fields or a properties of an XPO persistent class. Specifies that the target string or byte[] property/field is a stream, when generating OData v3 Service metadata.
Applied to non-persistent properties. Specifies that the target property value should be visible to XPO Odata v3 Service clients.
